name: Builder Duels
description:
A port of a classic board game, Builder Duels is a two player game where the goal is to move your worker onto a level 3 building. On your turn select a Builder, move them and then build in an neighbouring space.

Building on a space increases it's level , they start at 0.

You can only move onto a space if it's level is no more than one higher than where your builder started their turn.
